title: Transformative Voice AI: Krisp Unveils Breakthrough Accent Changer for Indian English to US English
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and global finance, clear communication is paramount. Imagine overcoming accent barriers in international collaborations and deals. Audio startup Krisp is stepping into this arena with a fascinating innovation: an AI accent changer designed to transform Indian English accents into US English in real-time. Could this be a game-changer for global teams and businesses operating in the crypto space and beyond? Let‚Äôs dive into how this technology works and its potential impact. Decoding the AI Accent Changer: How Does Krisp‚Äôs Voice AI Work? Krisp‚Äôs new feature leverages the power of voice AI to perform real-time accent conversion. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the technology: Phoneme Switching: Instead of altering the speaker‚Äôs voice entirely, the AI focuses on switching phonemes ‚Äì the basic units of sound in speech ‚Äì to align with American English pronunciation. This means your unique voice characteristics are preserved, while the accent is modified. Real-time Processing: The accent conversion happens instantly during calls, eliminating the need for pre-training or voice profiling. The AI dynamically creates a speaker profile as you talk. Beta Testing and Enterprise Validation: Krisp has rigorously tested this feature in enterprise environments, reporting significant improvements in sales conversion rates and revenue per booking. A beta version is now available for desktop app users. Accessibility: Users can activate the speech accent conversion feature anytime during a call, offering flexibility and control over their communication style. Arto Minasyan, Krisp‚Äôs co-founder, highlighted the motivation behind this innovation: bridging communication gaps. He noted that accent misunderstandings can hinder effective conversations, and this AI accent changer is designed to facilitate clearer, more universally understood English communication. Indian English to US English: Why This Focus? Krisp‚Äôs initial focus on converting Indian English to US English is strategic. Here‚Äôs why: Large STEM Workforce: India boasts a significant portion of the global STEM workforce. Many professionals in technology, engineering, and mathematics ‚Äì fields crucial to the crypto and blockchain space ‚Äì are based in India and communicate internationally. Global Collaboration: As businesses become increasingly globalized, especially in decentralized sectors like cryptocurrency, effective cross-cultural communication is vital. Reducing accent-related misunderstandings can enhance collaboration and productivity. Future Expansion: While starting with Indian English, Krisp plans to expand support to other accents, including Filipino, indicating a broader vision for global speech accent conversion . Other companies, like Sanas, are also exploring similar technologies, particularly for call centers. This indicates a growing recognition of the importance of accent modification in professional communication. Challenges and the Path Forward for Voice AI While promising, Krisp‚Äôs voice AI accent changer is still in its beta phase and faces certain challenges: Naturalness of Converted Voice: Initial user testing revealed that the processed voice might not always sound entirely natural and could occasionally miss words. Krisp acknowledges these limitations, attributing them to the beta stage and promising ongoing model improvements. Accuracy and Reliability: Ensuring consistent and accurate accent conversion across diverse speaking styles and speeds is crucial for widespread adoption. Further refinement of the AI model is essential. Ethical Considerations: Questions around authenticity and potential misuse of accent conversion technology need to be addressed as the technology evolves. Transparency and user control will be key. Krisp is training its model using vast datasets of speech samples, including data from its meeting assistant (with user consent). Continuous data-driven improvement is expected to enhance the performance and naturalness of the AI accent changer . The Future of Global Communication and Voice AI Krisp‚Äôs innovation signals a potential shift in how we approach global communication. Imagine a future where: Seamless International Collaboration: Accent barriers are minimized, fostering smoother and more effective communication in international teams and partnerships, crucial for globally distributed crypto projects. Enhanced Customer Interactions: Businesses can use voice AI to ensure clear and consistent communication with a diverse global customer base. Accessible Communication Tools: Individuals can leverage accent conversion to improve their communication confidence and opportunities in international settings. With upcoming iOS and Android apps and a Chrome extension for Google Meet, Krisp is expanding its reach and aiming to integrate voice AI into various communication platforms. The evolution of speech accent conversion technology holds significant implications for global interactions in the digital age. Actionable Insights: Embracing Voice AI for Enhanced Communication For professionals and businesses in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space, Krisp‚Äôs AI accent changer presents intriguing possibilities: Explore Beta Testing: If you frequently engage in international calls, consider trying out the Krisp beta desktop app to experience the accent conversion feature firsthand and assess its benefits for your communication needs. Monitor Developments: Keep an eye on the progress of voice AI technologies. As these tools mature, they could become invaluable assets for global teams and customer-facing roles. Consider Ethical Implications: Engage in discussions about the ethical use of accent conversion technology within your teams and organizations. Promote responsible and transparent implementation. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards Bridging Communication Gaps Krisp‚Äôs AI accent changer is a bold and potentially transformative step in leveraging artificial intelligence to bridge communication gaps. While still in its early stages, this technology holds the promise of fostering clearer and more inclusive global conversations. As voice AI continues to evolve, its impact on international collaboration, particularly in dynamic and globally interconnected fields like cryptocurrency, could be profound. The journey of speech accent conversion is just beginning, and its future is ripe with possibilities. To learn more about the latest voice AI trends, explore our articles on key developments shaping AI communication features.

title: Unlock Crypto Earning Potential: TruBit & Morpho‚Äôs Revolutionary DeFi Partnership in Latin America
body: Exciting news for crypto enthusiasts in Latin America! Leading crypto exchange TruBit has announced a groundbreaking partnership with DeFi lending protocol Morpho. This collaboration is set to introduce a novel DeFi earn product, promising to bridge the gap between traditional finance (TradFi) usability and the innovative world of decentralized finance (DeFi). Are you ready to explore how this powerful alliance could reshape crypto earning opportunities in the region? What is DeFi Earn and Why is it a Game Changer? DeFi Earn , at its core, refers to earning yield or interest on your cryptocurrency holdings through decentralized finance protocols. Unlike traditional finance where you might earn minimal interest in a savings account, DeFi opens up avenues for potentially higher returns by lending, staking, or providing liquidity in various crypto platforms. This new offering from TruBit and Morpho aims to simplify access to these complex DeFi mechanisms, making it user-friendly even for those new to the crypto space. Here‚Äôs why DeFi earn is creating waves: Higher Yield Potential: DeFi platforms often offer significantly higher annual percentage yields (APYs) compared to traditional savings or fixed deposits. Transparency and Control: Transactions are recorded on the blockchain, offering transparency. Users typically retain control of their assets in non-custodial wallets. Financial Inclusion: DeFi can provide access to financial services for the unbanked and underbanked populations, particularly relevant in regions like Latin America. Innovation and Growth: The DeFi space is constantly evolving, with new protocols and earning strategies emerging regularly. TruBit and Morpho: A Powerful Partnership for Latin America Crypto TruBit, a cryptocurrency exchange licensed in both Mexico and Argentina, is well-positioned to understand the specific needs and challenges of the Latin America Crypto market. By partnering with Morpho, a renowned DeFi lending protocol, TruBit is taking a significant step towards offering sophisticated financial products to its user base while maintaining the ease of use expected from a fintech platform. This collaboration effectively marries the user-friendly interface of TruBit with the robust and efficient DeFi infrastructure of Morpho. Key Highlights of the TruBit-Morpho Partnership: Localized Crypto Solutions: Tailoring DeFi products to the Latin American market, considering local regulations and user preferences. Enhanced User Experience: Simplifying the complexities of DeFi to make it accessible to a broader audience, including those new to crypto. Regulatory Compliance: TruBit‚Äôs licensing in Mexico and Argentina provides a compliant framework for offering these DeFi services. Growth Potential: Tapping into the rapidly growing crypto adoption in Latin America, driven by factors like inflation and limited access to traditional financial services. Exploring the Benefits of Crypto Earn with TruBit and Morpho What exactly can users expect from this new Crypto Earn product? The partnership aims to deliver a seamless and secure way for TruBit users to participate in DeFi lending through the Morpho protocol. This means users can potentially earn interest on their crypto holdings without needing to navigate the often-complex world of decentralized exchanges and DeFi protocols directly. Benefits for TruBit Users: Benefit Description Simplified DeFi Access Users can access DeFi earning opportunities directly through the TruBit platform, eliminating the need for external DeFi wallets or complex interactions with protocols. Potentially Higher Returns Leveraging Morpho‚Äôs efficient lending protocol, users can aim for competitive APYs on their crypto assets. User-Friendly Interface TruBit‚Äôs fintech expertise ensures a smooth and intuitive user experience, making DeFi accessible to everyone. Security and Trust Partnering with a reputable DeFi protocol like Morpho adds a layer of trust and security to the offering. Navigating Challenges in the DeFi Landscape While the potential of DeFi earn products is immense, it‚Äôs crucial to acknowledge the challenges and risks involved. The DeFi space, while innovative, is still relatively nascent and comes with its own set of complexities and potential pitfalls. Understanding these challenges is vital for anyone considering participating in DeFi Lending or similar activities. Potential Challenges and Risks: Smart Contract Risks: DeFi protocols rely on smart contracts, which, if flawed, can be vulnerable to exploits and hacks. Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile. The value of assets used in DeFi protocols can fluctuate significantly, impacting earnings and principal. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for DeFi is still evolving globally. Changes in regulations could impact the operation and legality of DeFi platforms. Complexity: Despite efforts to simplify DeFi, the underlying technology and concepts can still be complex for new users to fully grasp. Impermanent Loss: In certain DeFi activities like liquidity providing, users can face impermanent loss, where the value of their deposited assets can decrease relative to simply holding them. Actionable Insights: Getting Started with DeFi Earn on TruBit Interested in exploring DeFi Earn with TruBit and Morpho? Here are some actionable insights to get you started: Educate Yourself: Before diving in, take the time to understand DeFi, lending protocols, and the specific product offered by TruBit and Morpho. Start Small: Begin with a small amount to test the waters and familiarize yourself with the process. Understand the Risks: Be fully aware of the risks associated with DeFi, including smart contract risks and volatility. Security Best Practices: Ensure you are following security best practices for your TruBit account and any related crypto wallets. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with developments in the DeFi space and any announcements from TruBit and Morpho regarding their product. Conclusion: A Bold Step Towards DeFi Adoption in Latin America The partnership between TruBit and Morpho marks an exciting step forward for DeFi adoption in Latin America. By combining TruBit‚Äôs regional expertise and user-centric approach with Morpho‚Äôs cutting-edge DeFi technology, this collaboration has the potential to unlock significant earning opportunities for crypto users in Mexico, Argentina, and beyond. While the DeFi landscape presents its own set of challenges, initiatives like this are crucial in making decentralized finance more accessible and beneficial to a wider audience. This venture is not just about earning; it‚Äôs about empowering individuals with new financial tools and shaping the future of finance in Latin America. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Unveiling Amazon‚Äôs Exciting AI Investment: Alexa Fund Backs AI Startups
body: In the fast-evolving world of technology, where innovation is the lifeblood, even giants like Amazon are constantly adapting and reinvesting. For those keeping a close eye on the cryptocurrency and tech landscape, understanding where major players are placing their bets is crucial. And here‚Äôs a fascinating development: Amazon‚Äôs Alexa Fund, initially focused on voice technology, is now making a bold pivot towards the booming field of AI startups . This isn‚Äôt just a minor tweak; it‚Äôs a significant expansion signaling where Amazon sees the future of tech heading. Let‚Äôs dive into what this exciting shift means for the AI ecosystem and beyond. Why is Amazon‚Äôs Alexa Fund Now Targeting AI Startups? Launched in 2015, the Alexa Fund was originally conceived to fuel innovation in voice-first technologies, aligning perfectly with the rise of Alexa and voice assistants. However, the tech world doesn‚Äôt stand still. The monumental advancements in large language models and generative AI have created a paradigm shift. Amazon, recognizing this transformative wave, is strategically repositioning the Alexa Fund to capitalize on this new frontier. With Amazon itself launching Gen AI-powered Alexa+ and a suite of multimodal AI models, it‚Äôs a natural progression for their investment arm to follow suit. Paul Bernard, the leader of the Alexa Fund , articulated this evolution in a recent blog post. He explained that while the Fund‚Äôs core mission has always been about pushing technological boundaries, the ‚Äúrapid developments in AI present an inflection point‚Äù. This inflection point allows the Fund to embrace cutting-edge AI investment while staying true to its original goal of fostering innovation. The Fund is now actively seeking to invest in startups that are pioneering: AI-enabled Hardware : The next generation of devices infused with artificial intelligence. Smart Agents : Intelligent assistants that go beyond voice commands, anticipating user needs and acting proactively. Generative Media : Startups creating novel forms of content using AI. Emerging AI Architectures : Companies developing the foundational technologies that will power future AI breakthroughs. To get a clearer picture of this evolving strategy, Bitcoin World had an exclusive conversation with Paul Bernard, diving deep into the renewed mission and recent investments of the Alexa Fund . What Kind of AI Startups is the Alexa Fund Investing In? The Alexa Fund isn‚Äôt just talking the talk; they‚Äôre walking the walk with concrete investments in promising AI startups . Recently, they‚Äôve added four new companies to their portfolio, each tackling unique challenges and opportunities within the AI space: NinjaTech AI : Imagine an AI Swiss Army knife. NinjaTech AI is developing an all-encompassing AI platform. Their chatbot is not just about text; it can generate code, conjure images and videos, conduct in-depth research, and even manage your schedule. Think of it as a supercharged AI assistant, similar to Quora‚Äôs Poe, offering access to a range of powerful models from OpenAI, Meta, Anthropic, Google, and Deepseek. Notably, Amazon highlights that NinjaTech AI‚Äôs infrastructure is built on AWS, showcasing synergy within the Amazon ecosystem. Hedra : For the creatives out there, Hedra is an AI media company that‚Äôs making waves in content generation. Their studio empowers users to create stunning visuals, audio, and video using AI . With the recent launch of Character-3 AI , Hedra is pushing the boundaries of AI -driven content creation. Having already secured $10 million in funding last year from prominent investors like a16z Games Speedrun, Abstract, and Index Ventures, Hedra is a startup to watch. Ario : Balancing family life can be chaotic. Ario steps in as an AI -powered family management app designed to bring order to scheduling and task management. One of its standout features is a ‚Äúschool email decoder‚Äù that intelligently extracts events and action items from school communications. Paul Bernard from the Alexa Fund praised Ario‚Äôs ability to understand the personal context behind tasks, a crucial element for effective family organization. While other startups like Hearth Display and Maple are also tackling family schedule management, Ario‚Äôs AI -driven approach offers a fresh perspective. HeyBoss : If you‚Äôre online in tech circles, you‚Äôve likely encountered the buzz around ‚Äúvibe coding.‚Äù HeyBoss is a startup firmly in this space, enabling users to create websites, apps, games, and prototypes simply by describing their vision. This low-code/no-code approach is gaining momentum, with companies like Cursor, Lovable, Replit, and Bolt.new also innovating in this area. HeyBoss democratizes development, making it accessible to a wider range of creators. What are the Strategic Benefits for Amazon? For Amazon, AI investment in these startups isn‚Äôt purely altruistic; it‚Äôs a strategic move with multiple layers of benefits. These startups become invaluable proving grounds for Amazon‚Äôs extensive cloud and AI stack. Many gain early access to private APIs and SDKs, essentially becoming living laboratories for Amazon‚Äôs technologies. Furthermore, Amazon provides these startups with access to senior executives and opportunities within Amazon Business, fostering a symbiotic relationship. This strategy mirrors a broader trend in the tech industry. Major players in AI are actively funding promising startups to expand their ecosystems and drive innovation. OpenAI‚Äôs startup fund, for example, has backed numerous ventures across healthcare, robotics, edtech, and creative tools. Anthropic has partnered with Menlo Ventures to create an investment vehicle, and Google has recently invested in companies like Glance and Toonsutra, offering them access to their AI models. The Future of AI Investment and Innovation Amazon‚Äôs redoubled focus on AI startups through the Alexa Fund is a clear indicator of the immense potential and transformative power of artificial intelligence. By strategically funding and nurturing these early-stage companies, Amazon is not only expanding its own ecosystem but also contributing to the broader advancement of AI technologies. This wave of AI investment from tech giants signals a dynamic and rapidly evolving landscape, promising exciting innovations and applications in the years to come. For those in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space, the underlying technologies driving AI , such as decentralized computing and data management, may find increasing synergy and relevance as AI continues its exponential growth. The convergence of AI and blockchain could unlock entirely new paradigms, and Amazon‚Äôs proactive stance in AI investment positions them at the forefront of this technological revolution. To learn more about the latest AI investment trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features and institutional adoption.

title: Urgent Update: Hyperliquid‚Äôs Bold Move to Compensate Users After Shocking JELLY Incident
body: In the fast-paced world of decentralized finance (DeFi), trust and transparency are paramount. When incidents occur, how platforms respond can significantly impact user confidence and the future of the ecosystem. Recently, Hyperliquid, a prominent decentralized exchange (DEX), faced a challenging situation involving its JELLY perpetual futures market. Following evidence of suspicious market activity, Hyperliquid made a decisive move: delisting JELLY and, more importantly, pledging to compensate affected users. This article dives deep into the Hyperliquid compensation plan, the details surrounding the JELLY incident, and what it all means for the broader crypto landscape. What Exactly Happened with the JELLY Incident on Hyperliquid? To understand the gravity of Hyperliquid‚Äôs decision, let‚Äôs break down the sequence of events that led to the JELLY incident : * Suspicious Activity Detected : Hyperliquid‚Äôs monitoring systems flagged unusual trading patterns in the JELLY perpetual futures market. * Massive Short Position: A trader opened an extraordinarily large short position of 430 million JELLY tokens. This is a highly leveraged bet that the price of JELLY would decrease significantly. * Liquidation and Margin Withdrawal: The trader strategically liquidated a smaller portion (30 million JELLY) of their position, seemingly to manipulate the market and then withdrew a substantial margin of 2.76 million USDC. * Forced Liquidation: This initial activity triggered a cascading effect, leading to the liquidation of a massive 398 million JELLY tokens from other traders‚Äô positions. * Price Skyrocket & Losses: As the market reacted, the price of JELLY unexpectedly surged. This price spike caused significant unrealized losses on the Hyperliquid liquidation address, exceeding $10 million. * Liquidation at Profit: Interestingly, the Hyperliquid liquidation address managed to close out the JELLY short position at $0.0095, ultimately making a profit of around $700,000 despite the earlier losses. This suggests a complex and potentially manipulative trading strategy was at play. This chain of events highlights the volatile nature of cryptocurrency markets and the potential for sophisticated trading strategies to exploit vulnerabilities, even on advanced platforms like Hyperliquid. Hyperliquid‚Äôs Response: Prioritizing User Compensation In the wake of the JELLY incident , Hyperliquid‚Äôs response has been swift and user-centric. Here‚Äôs a look at their key actions: * Immediate Delisting: Recognizing the ongoing risks and potential for further manipulation, Hyperliquid acted decisively by delisting the JELLY perpetual futures market. This was done through a validator vote, showcasing a degree of on-chain governance. * Investigation and Transparency: Hyperliquid launched an investigation into the suspicious market activity to understand the full extent of the manipulation and identify the responsible parties. * Commitment to Compensation: Crucially, Hyperliquid announced its commitment to compensate users who suffered losses due to the incident, excluding those involved in the suspicious activity. This pledge is a significant step towards restoring user trust. * Hyper Foundation Backing: The compensation will be provided by the Hyper Foundation, indicating a strong financial backing and commitment to making users whole. * Details to Follow: Hyperliquid has promised to release further details on the compensation method soon, assuring users that a fair and equitable process will be implemented. This proactive approach to Hyperliquid compensation demonstrates a commitment to user protection that is crucial for the long-term health and credibility of DeFi platforms. Addressing Crypto Exchange Centralization Concerns The JELLY incident has reignited discussions around crypto exchange centralization , even within the DeFi space. While Hyperliquid is a decentralized exchange, certain aspects of its operation have come under scrutiny: * Validator Vote for Delisting: The decision to delist JELLY through a validator vote, while showcasing on-chain governance, also raises questions about the level of centralization within the validator set and their influence on market decisions. Is this truly decentralized if a small group can make such impactful changes? * Risk Management and Monitoring: While Hyperliquid detected the suspicious activity, questions arise about the effectiveness of risk management systems in preventing such incidents in the first place. Can DeFi platforms be truly resilient against sophisticated market manipulation tactics? * Transparency of Operations: Critics argue that more transparency is needed regarding Hyperliquid‚Äôs operational processes, including its risk management protocols and the decision-making processes of its validators. Greater transparency can foster trust and allow users to better assess the risks involved. These concerns are not unique to Hyperliquid but are pertinent to the broader DeFi ecosystem. The balance between decentralization, efficiency, and security remains a critical challenge. DeFi Risk Management: Lessons from the JELLY Incident The JELLY incident serves as a stark reminder of the inherent DeFi risk management challenges in decentralized finance. Here are some key takeaways: * Market Manipulation is a Real Threat: Even in supposedly decentralized environments, sophisticated actors can attempt to manipulate markets for their gain. Robust monitoring and risk management systems are essential. * Liquidity and Volatility: The incident highlights the interplay between liquidity and volatility in crypto markets. Low liquidity pairs can be particularly susceptible to manipulation, and rapid price swings can amplify losses. * Importance of Audits and Security: While not directly related to smart contract vulnerabilities in this case, the incident underscores the ongoing need for rigorous audits and security measures to protect DeFi platforms and users. * User Education is Crucial: Users need to be aware of the risks associated with trading volatile and less liquid assets, and understand the mechanics of leverage and liquidation. * Platform Responsibility: DeFi platforms have a responsibility to implement robust risk management systems, provide transparent information, and act decisively to protect users when incidents occur, as Hyperliquid is demonstrating with its compensation plan. Rebuilding User Trust in DeFi Incidents like the JELLY situation can erode user trust in DeFi platforms. Hyperliquid‚Äôs proactive approach to Hyperliquid compensation is a vital step in rebuilding that trust. Here‚Äôs why their response is important for fostering user confidence: * Demonstrates Accountability: By taking responsibility and offering compensation, Hyperliquid shows that it values its users and is accountable for events on its platform, even when caused by external actors. * Sets a Precedent: This action sets a positive precedent for other DeFi platforms facing similar challenges. It signals that user protection should be a top priority. * Encourages Responsible Platform Behavior: Knowing that they may be held responsible for user losses due to market manipulation incentivizes platforms to invest in better security and risk management. * Strengthens DeFi‚Äôs Reputation: By addressing issues transparently and fairly, the DeFi sector as a whole can build a stronger reputation for reliability and user-centricity. owever, rebuilding user trust is an ongoing process. Hyperliquid needs to follow through on its compensation promise and provide clear details on the process. Furthermore, continued efforts to enhance security, transparency, and risk management are essential for the entire DeFi space to thrive. Actionable Insights for Crypto Users What can crypto users learn from the JELLY incident and Hyperliquid‚Äôs response? * Diversify Your Holdings: Avoid concentrating your portfolio in highly volatile or low-liquidity assets. Diversification can mitigate risk. * Understand Leverage and Risk: If you trade leveraged products, fully understand the risks of liquidation and potential losses. Use leverage responsibly. * Choose Platforms Wisely: Research DeFi platforms thoroughly. Look for platforms with robust security measures, transparent risk management practices, and a track record of user support. * Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with news and developments in the crypto space. Understanding market dynamics and platform responses to incidents can help you make informed decisions. * Engage with Communities: Participate in platform communities and discussions. Sharing information and experiences can help identify potential risks and best practices. Actionable Insights for Crypto Users Conclusion: A Critical Moment for Hyperliquid and DeFi The Hyperliquid compensation plan in response to the JELLY incident is a significant development. It showcases a commitment to user protection and a willingness to address the challenges inherent in decentralized finance. While questions about crypto exchange centralization and DeFi risk management remain, Hyperliquid‚Äôs decisive action provides a glimmer of hope and a potential roadmap for other platforms facing similar crises. The success of the compensation process and Hyperliquid‚Äôs ongoing efforts to enhance security and transparency will be crucial in determining whether this incident ultimately strengthens or weakens user trust in the platform and the broader DeFi ecosystem. This is a critical moment for Hyperliquid and a valuable learning opportunity for the entire crypto space. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Argentine poll suggests 57% don‚Äôt trust President Milei after LIBRA scandal
body: Nearly 58% of Argentinians said they don‚Äôt trust President Javier Milei following his involvement in the $4.6 billion Libra crypto scandal, according to a recent poll. ‚ÄúMore than a month after the crypto fraud scandal broke out, how much do you trust Milei today?‚Äù polling platform Zuban C√≥rdoba asked 1,600 respondents in its recently released March survey, to which 57.6% replied that they disapprove of him, while 36% said Milei still has their trust. The remaining 6.4% said they weren‚Äôt sure, the report stated. Percentage of trust that Argentines have in Milei after the Libra scandal. Source: Zuban C√≥rdoba This was the first time the question was asked within a Zuban C√≥rdoba poll. However, several other metrics, such as Milei‚Äôs image and the national management approval rating, have plummeted considerably in recent months. The latter of those metrics, for example, fell from 47.3% in November to 41.6% in March. ‚ÄúFifty-eight percent disapprove of Javier Milei‚Äôs management. Negativity increases slowly but steadily and seems to find no ceiling,‚Äù Zuban C√≥rdoba said. ‚ÄúThe change in tone and evaluation of the government is consolidating as more and more problematic fronts appear on the political agenda.‚Äù Zuban C√≥rdoba conducted its study between March 12 and March 14, and the sample size of 1,600 participants had a confidence level of 95% and a sampling error of 2.45%. Another survey from the University of San Andr√©s conducted between March 11-20 with 1,020 respondents found that Milei‚Äôs approval rating dropped to 45%. However, not all polls paint the same picture of President Milei. Data collected from Morning Consult between Feb. 27 and March 5 indicates that Milei still possessed a 62.4% approval rating after the Libra scandal. Related: LIBRA memecoin orchestrators named as defendants in US class-action suit Milei has distanced himself from Libra since the scandal, arguing he didn‚Äôt ‚Äúpromote‚Äù the LIBRA token in a controversial Feb. 14 X post ‚Äî as fraud lawsuits filed against him allege ‚Äî and instead merely ‚Äúspread the word‚Äù about it. The Libra (LIBRA) token soared to a $4.6 billion market cap shortly after Milei‚Äôs X post before tanking nearly 94% over the next few hours. Argentina‚Äôs opposition party called for Milei‚Äôs impeachment but has had limited success thus far. President Milei‚Äôs party still in lead as election looms The controversy comes as the next Argentine election is set to take place on Oct. 26. Despite the negative results, Milei‚Äôs La Libertad Avanza party is still most likely to take out the next Argentine election, with 36.7% in favor of the libertarian party, while Uni√≥n por la Patria comes in next at 32.5%. However, only 43% of Argentine respondents believe that Milei ‚Äî an economist prior to taking office ‚Äî has sufficiently controlled inflation, while 63% of those polled oppose Milei‚Äôs efforts to secure a new loan from the International Monetary Fund. Magazine: Meet lawyer Max Burwick ‚Äî ‚ÄòThe ambulance chaser of crypto‚Äô

title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: Analyst says There Is 100% Chance Of A Bullish Rally, Here‚Äôs Why
body: Dogecoin appears to be preparing for its next significant move, with a familiar price structure showing up on its price chart. According to crypto analyst (basictradingtv), the meme coin is playing out a trend of rounding bottom patterns and parabolic rallies, which have always sent its price to all-time highs. The current setup suggests that Dogecoin‚Äôs ongoing recovery from its March low may not just be a temporary bounce, but there‚Äôs a 100% chance it is the beginning of a much larger parabolic rally. Dogecoin Trading In A Familiar Cycle: 100% Chance Of Rally At the core of the bullish forecast is the recurrence of a well-known price pattern, the rounding bottom. Dogecoin is known for trading in multi-year cycles that start with a gradual bottoming formation, eventually leading to explosive rallies. This pattern, visible on longer-term charts, has formed again over the past several months. Related Reading: Dogecoin Activity Levels Crash To 4-Month Lows, Does This Spell Doom For The Meme Coin? As shown in the monthly candlestick timeframe chart below, the rounding bottom played out during the time period between Dogecoin‚Äôs all-time high in 2021, the bear market in 2022, and the recovery phase in late 2024. The recovery led to Dogecoin pushing to new highs since 2021, which was probably the start of the parabolic rally phase. However, this time around, the anticipated parabolic rally was temporarily interrupted by a strong resistance zone. After reaching highs around $0.48 in December 2024, Dogecoin saw a rejection that has seen its price going on a correction path until it reached $0.1477 in early March. But rather than breaking below, this level acted as a solid support. Since then, the price rebounded slightly and has recovered to $0.2 at the time of writing. With this in mind, the analyst predicted that the bullish cycle is intact, with the parabolic leg of the pattern expected to unfold anytime soon. Monthly Candle Needs To Close Above Support Right now, the most important step is for Dogecoin to close its monthly candlestick for March above the key support level established during the recent market correction. If this is successful, it will certify 100% that a bullish parabolic rally will follow. The analyst also pointed out two important levels for Dogecoin in the coming weeks and months: $0.15 and $0.5. The $0.15 level was tested during Dogecoin‚Äôs sharp pullback earlier this month, when the price dipped to as low as $0.1477. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Enters Order Block Zone That Could Trigger Rally To ATHs $0.15 now acts as the support level that should not be broken. The longer Dogecoin tests this support level, the longer the delay for the parabolic rally. Fortunately, the recovery from that zone has added technical strength to the argument that buyers are going to step in at that level. Meanwhile, $0.5 is identified as the primary resistance target ahead. Breaking through that resistance will confirm the start of a full-fledged parabolic rally, similar to the one that sent Dogecoin to its all-time high in 2021. At the time of writing, Dogecoin is trading at $0.2052, up by 10.8% in the past 24 hours. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Breakthrough: GetReal Cracks AI Deepfakes with $18M & Impressive Client List
body: Are you concerned about the increasingly realistic AI deepfakes flooding the digital landscape? You‚Äôre not alone. Deepfakes are no longer just a futuristic worry; they‚Äôre a present danger, costing companies millions and posing serious national security risks. But there‚Äôs a beacon of hope in the fight against this emerging threat: GetReal. This startup, armed with $18 million in funding and a client list that speaks volumes, claims to have cracked the code on AI deepfakes . Let‚Äôs dive into how GetReal is revolutionizing deepfake detection and safeguarding our digital world. Funding Fuels the Fight Against AI Deepfakes GetReal, co-founded by Dr. Hany Farid, a pioneer in deepfake detection technology, has successfully raised $17.5 million in Series A equity funding. This significant investment, led by Forgepoint Capital, with participation from Ballistic Ventures, Evolution Equity, and K2 Access Fund, will propel GetReal‚Äôs research and development, expand its team, and accelerate business development. This financial backing underscores the urgency and importance of addressing the growing threat of AI deepfakes . The funding coincides with the launch of GetReal‚Äôs groundbreaking forensics platform as a service. This platform offers: Web Interface: User-friendly access to deepfake analysis tools. API: Seamless integration for automated media analysis. Media Analysis-as-a-Service: Scalable solution for various organizational needs. Key features of GetReal‚Äôs platform include: Threat Exposure Dashboard: Provides a comprehensive overview of potential deepfake risks. ‚ÄúInspect‚Äù Tool: Specifically designed to protect high-profile executives from impersonation attacks. ‚ÄúProtect‚Äù Tool: Screens media content to proactively identify and block deepfakes. ‚ÄúRespond‚Äù Service: Offers in-depth analysis by GetReal‚Äôs expert human teams for complex cases. The Brains Behind the Breakthrough in Deepfake Detection GetReal‚Äôs origins are deeply rooted in expertise. Incubated at Ballistic Ventures since 2022, the startup emerged from stealth mode in June 2024. Ballistic‚Äôs founder, Ted Schlein, also serves as GetReal‚Äôs chairman and co-founder, highlighting the venture capital firm‚Äôs strong belief in GetReal‚Äôs mission. Adding to this powerhouse team is CEO Matt Moynahan, a seasoned cybersecurity veteran with decades of experience leading companies like Symantec and Forcepoint. He emphasizes the critical gap GetReal is filling in the cyber forensics landscape, stating, ‚ÄúIf you think cybersecurity has a shortage of people, get ready for forensics.‚Äù However, the true linchpin is co-founder Dr. Hany Farid. A renowned academic from UC Berkeley, Farid has spent years pioneering techniques for identifying manipulated digital images, long before AI deepfakes became a mainstream concern. Moynahan aptly describes GetReal‚Äôs core offering as ‚ÄúHany as a service,‚Äù explaining how they‚Äôve transformed Farid‚Äôs deep expertise into a scalable, cloud-based platform. Farid himself notes the fascinating blend of cutting-edge technology and timeless principles in their approach: ‚ÄúThere are techniques we developed 20 years ago that still work today,‚Äù showcasing the enduring foundation of their deepfake detection methods. Strategic Backing and Real-World Validation for AI Forensics The Series A funding round isn‚Äôt just about the amount raised; it‚Äôs about the strategic investors involved. Cisco Investments, Capital One Ventures, and In-Q-Tel (linked to the CIA) are among the backers, signaling strong industry and government interest in GetReal‚Äôs AI forensics capabilities. Alberto Y√©pez of Forgepoint Capital points out that regulated industries, particularly financial institutions, are proactively seeking solutions like GetReal‚Äôs due to board-level concerns about deepfake impersonations, especially after instances of CEO voice impersonations. Notable clients like John Deere and Visa further validate the platform‚Äôs real-world effectiveness. While GetReal‚Äôs current focus is on audio, video, and image deepfake detection , the recent incident involving The Atlantic‚Äôs editor being mistakenly added to a Signal group chat planning a military attack highlights the emerging threat of text-based impersonations. Farid acknowledges that text is a ‚Äúdifferent beast‚Äù but confirms that expanding to address all forms of deepfake and impersonation threats is a long-term goal. Is GetReal the Ultimate Weapon Against AI Deepfakes? GetReal‚Äôs emergence with significant funding, a stellar team, and an impressive client roster strongly suggests they are a leading contender in the fight against AI deepfakes . Their platform, built on decades of expertise and cutting-edge technology, offers a comprehensive suite of tools for detection and response. However, the battle against deepfakes is constantly evolving. Here‚Äôs a quick look at the landscape: Pros of GetReal Challenges for Deepfake Detection Expert-led technology with proven methods. Deepfake technology is rapidly advancing. Strong funding and strategic partnerships. Detecting text-based deepfakes is a new frontier. Comprehensive platform with various tools and services. The ‚Äòfun‚Äô deepfake apps contribute to the problem. Addresses a critical gap in cyber forensics talent. Phishing tactics are becoming more sophisticated. While GetReal appears to have made significant strides in deepfake detection , the ongoing arms race between deepfake creators and detection technology means continuous innovation and adaptation are crucial. The $18 million investment and the caliber of clients and investors signal a powerful vote of confidence in GetReal‚Äôs approach. Whether they have definitively ‚Äúcracked the code‚Äù remains to be seen, but they are undoubtedly a formidable force in safeguarding the digital realm from the insidious threat of AI deepfakes . To learn more about the latest AI deepfake trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) Gives a Very Exclusive Interview: Talks About Ethereum, Altcoins, Memecoins, His Jail Time
body: Changpeng Zhao (CZ), founder and former CEO of cryptocurrency exchange Binance, gave an exclusive interview. Here is the summary of the detailed interview and the most important points to know. Binance founder and former CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) explained that the company chose Abu Dhabi as its home base due to its regulatory environment and strategic location rather than its financing needs. According to CZ, the UAE‚Äôs compliance framework provides Binance with a stable foundation for global expansion. CZ acknowledged that the memecoin ecosystem is growing, attributing the rise to community-driven imagination. However, he warned that memecoins carry high risks, indicating a need for user education and clear risk warnings. Referring to US President Donald Trump‚Äôs memecoin launch, CZ explained that most celebrity coins are launched by third parties for publicity purposes, and urged public figures to focus on long-term, value-driven projects instead. Binance aims to maintain a balanced market where institutional investors do not disproportionately benefit individual users. CZ stated that the exchange should not act as a gatekeeper, but instead promote transparency. He encouraged projects to disclose their token locking mechanisms and leverage third-party smart contracts to increase trust. Looking forward, CZ expressed optimism about the rise of decentralized exchanges (DEXs) as the future of the industry. Related News: According to Onchain Data, the Founder of this Altcoin Starts Selling Again CZ assessed the industry‚Äôs transition from requiring a private blockchain for token issuance to the widespread adoption of the ERC-20 standard. He believes that despite the lowering of technical barriers, community consensus remains the primary driver of value. He urged the crypto space to move beyond financial speculation and explore real-world applications such as government authentication and decentralized science (DeSci). While CZ admitted to missing out on an early Ethereum investment, he acknowledged ETH‚Äôs fundamental role in DeFi. However, he noted that Ethereum‚Äôs real problem lies not in its technology, but in its lack of innovation at the application layer. CZ, who recently evaluated the legal troubles he has experienced, shared that his four-month prison sentence has reshaped his perspective on life. Underlining the importance of family and health, CZ stated that he lost six kilos during his time in prison but is physically healthier. He noted that the biggest challenge is coping with the uncertainty of the situation. CZ introduced Giggle Academy, an educational initiative that aims to address global learning inequalities through gamified experiences. The project aims to equip users with job-related skills, such as AI data annotation, to improve employment opportunities around the world. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) Gives a Very Exclusive Interview: Talks About Ethereum, Altcoins, Memecoins, His Jail Time

title: Intriguing Shoutout: World Liberty Financial Champions Chainlink at DC Blockchain Summit
body: In a surprising turn of events at the recent DC Blockchain Summit, World Liberty Financial, a DeFi project with ties to the Trump family, publicly acknowledged Chainlink, a leading decentralized oracle network. This unexpected shoutout, highlighted by Chainlink‚Äôs Communications Director Chris Barrett on X (formerly Twitter), has sparked considerable interest and speculation within the crypto community. Let‚Äôs dive into why this mention is noteworthy and what it could signify for the future of Chainlink and the broader decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape. Why is the World Liberty Financial and Chainlink Mention at the DC Blockchain Summit Significant? The DC Blockchain Summit is a prominent event that brings together policymakers, industry leaders, and innovators in the blockchain and cryptocurrency space. It serves as a platform for discussions, announcements, and networking, shaping the regulatory and developmental trajectory of the industry. World Liberty Financial, co-founded by Zach Witkoff, choosing this stage to recognize Chainlink is significant for several reasons: Legitimacy and Mainstream Attention: World Liberty Financial‚Äôs association with the Trump family brings a level of mainstream attention and political relevance to the DeFi space. Their public acknowledgment of Chainlink at such a summit can be interpreted as a nod towards the growing acceptance and importance of decentralized technologies within traditional financial and political circles. Validation for Chainlink: For Chainlink, a project focused on providing secure and reliable data to smart contracts, this shoutout serves as further validation of its crucial role in the blockchain ecosystem. It highlights Chainlink‚Äôs growing recognition beyond the core crypto community and into more traditional finance adjacent sectors. Potential for Collaboration: While just a ‚Äòshoutout‚Äô for now, this public acknowledgment could hint at potential future collaborations or integrations between World Liberty Financial and Chainlink. For a DeFi project like World Liberty Financial, leveraging Chainlink‚Äôs oracle services could be instrumental in enhancing the security, reliability, and functionality of their platform. Broader DeFi Implications: This event underscores the increasing maturity and interconnectedness of the DeFi space. It signals a move towards greater collaboration and recognition between different projects, potentially fostering a more robust and integrated decentralized financial ecosystem. Chris Barrett‚Äôs X post, further amplified by Zach Witkoff‚Äôs repost, quickly circulated within the crypto community, igniting discussions on social media platforms and crypto forums. The brevity of the initial communication leaves room for interpretation and fuels speculation about the nature of this acknowledgment. What is Chainlink and Why Does it Matter in DeFi? Chainlink is a decentralized oracle network that plays a pivotal role in the functionality and security of smart contracts, particularly within the DeFi space. In simple terms, oracles are bridges that connect blockchains to the real world, enabling smart contracts to access external data, APIs, and payment systems. Here‚Äôs why Chainlink is crucial: Bridging the Data Gap: Blockchains, by design, are isolated environments. Smart contracts operating on blockchains cannot inherently access data from the outside world. Chainlink solves this by providing a secure and reliable way for smart contracts to receive external data feeds. Ensuring Data Integrity and Security: Chainlink‚Äôs decentralized nature is key. Instead of relying on a single point of failure, Chainlink uses a network of independent node operators to source and verify data. This decentralized approach enhances the security and reliability of the data provided to smart contracts, mitigating risks like data manipulation or single points of failure. Enabling Complex Smart Contracts: Many sophisticated DeFi applications rely heavily on real-world data. Price feeds for decentralized exchanges, weather data for insurance contracts, and random number generation for gaming platforms are just a few examples. Chainlink empowers the creation of these complex and data-driven smart contracts, expanding the possibilities of DeFi. Variety of Services: Beyond price feeds, Chainlink offers a suite of decentralized services, including Proof of Reserve (PoR) to verify the collateralization of assets, Verifiable Random Function (VRF) for provably fair randomness, and Keepers for automating smart contract functions. In essence, Chainlink is the infrastructure that enables smart contracts to interact with the real world in a secure and trustworthy manner, making it an indispensable component of the growing DeFi ecosystem. Its importance is reflected in its widespread adoption across numerous DeFi protocols and its recognition by projects like World Liberty Financial. World Liberty Financial: Trump Family‚Äôs Foray into DeFi? World Liberty Financial has garnered attention primarily due to its co-founder, Zach Witkoff, and its reported connection to the Trump family. While details about the project are still emerging, its association with such a prominent political family immediately places it under a spotlight. Here‚Äôs what we know and what it implies: Trump Family Ties: Reports suggest that World Liberty Financial is linked to the Trump family, although the exact nature and extent of this connection are not fully transparent. This association inevitably brings a certain level of political and public interest to the project. DeFi Ambitions: World Liberty Financial is positioned as a DeFi project, indicating its aim to operate within the decentralized finance space. This likely involves leveraging blockchain technology to offer financial services in a decentralized and potentially more accessible manner. Limited Public Information: As of now, detailed information about World Liberty Financial‚Äôs specific products, services, and roadmap is relatively scarce. Their website and public communications are still developing, leaving many aspects of their project shrouded in some mystery. Speculation and Scrutiny: Given the Trump family connection and the nascent stage of the project, World Liberty Financial is subject to both significant speculation and scrutiny. The crypto community and the broader public are keenly watching to see how this project evolves and what impact it might have. The involvement of individuals connected to prominent political figures in the DeFi space is a developing trend. It could signal a bridging of traditional political and financial spheres with the decentralized world of crypto. However, it also raises questions about regulatory implications, transparency, and the potential for political influence within the ostensibly decentralized realm of DeFi. What Does This Mean for the Future of Chainlink and DeFi? The Chainlink shoutout from World Liberty Financial at the DC Blockchain Summit, while seemingly a minor event, could have broader implications for both Chainlink and the DeFi sector as a whole. Here are some potential takeaways: Increased Institutional Interest in Chainlink: Recognition from a project with political connections like World Liberty Financial might attract further attention from institutional investors and traditional financial entities towards Chainlink. This could lead to increased adoption of Chainlink‚Äôs services in more mainstream financial applications. Growing Convergence of Traditional Finance and DeFi: This event may be another indicator of the increasing convergence between traditional finance and decentralized finance. As projects like World Liberty Financial, with links to established political and financial networks, enter the DeFi space, it could accelerate the integration of these two worlds. Heightened Regulatory Scrutiny: Increased mainstream and political attention on DeFi, partly driven by projects like World Liberty Financial, could also lead to heightened regulatory scrutiny. Policymakers may become more focused on understanding and regulating the DeFi space as it gains prominence in traditional circles. Potential for Mass Adoption of DeFi: Ultimately, events like these, which bring DeFi into the broader public consciousness, can contribute to the gradual mass adoption of decentralized finance. As more people become aware of and potentially interact with DeFi through projects with familiar connections, the path to wider adoption could be paved. In conclusion, World Liberty Financial‚Äôs public acknowledgment of Chainlink at the DC Blockchain Summit is more than just a casual mention. It‚Äôs a noteworthy event that highlights the evolving landscape of DeFi, the increasing recognition of Chainlink‚Äôs vital role, and the potential for greater convergence between the crypto world and traditional finance. As the DeFi space continues to mature and attract attention from diverse sectors, such seemingly small events can serve as significant markers of broader industry trends and future directions. title: Suspicious Funds Unveiled: OKX & Binance Wallets Linked to Hyperliquid JELLY Attack
body: The crypto sphere is buzzing with the latest developments in the Hyperliquid JELLY attack saga. On-chain data has unveiled a potentially significant piece of the puzzle: the funds utilized to orchestrate the JELLY short position attack on Hyperliquid originated from prominent cryptocurrency exchanges, OKX and Binance. This revelation, initially reported by LookOnChain via X (formerly Twitter), throws a new light on the incident and prompts crucial questions about exchange security and the flow of funds in decentralized finance (DeFi). What We Know About the Hyperliquid JELLY Attack and Fund Withdrawal For those unfamiliar, the Hyperliquid JELLY attack involved exploiting vulnerabilities in the platform to open substantial short positions in JELLY, a relatively new cryptocurrency. This maneuver reportedly caused price fluctuations and raised concerns within the Hyperliquid community. Now, LookOnChain‚Äôs findings suggest that the capital fueling this attack was traced back to withdrawals from two of the largest centralized exchanges in the world: OKX and Binance. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the key details: On-chain Investigation: LookOnChain, a reputable blockchain analytics firm, conducted an investigation into the flow of funds related to the Hyperliquid JELLY attack. Exchange Identification: Their analysis pointed towards OKX and Binance as the source of the funds used to execute the attack. Withdrawal Confirmation: Data indicates that the attacker withdrew cryptocurrency from these exchanges prior to initiating the JELLY short positions on Hyperliquid. Rumor Debunking: The news indirectly addresses earlier rumors suggesting Binance‚Äôs direct involvement as the orchestrator of the JELLY incident. While funds were withdrawn from Binance, this doesn‚Äôt automatically imply Binance‚Äôs complicity, but rather highlights the exchange as a platform used for fund movement. To visualize the flow, consider this simplified representation: Why is the Origin of Funds in the Hyperliquid JELLY Attack Important for Crypto Security? Understanding where the attack funds originated is critical for several reasons, particularly concerning crypto security and the overall integrity of the digital asset ecosystem: Exchange Security Protocols: The fact that funds could be withdrawn from major exchanges like OKX and Binance and then used for a market manipulation attack raises questions about Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) protocols. Were there any red flags missed? Can exchange security measures be further strengthened to prevent such incidents? Traceability of Funds: This incident underscores the importance of blockchain analytics in tracing illicit activities. The ability to follow the flow of funds on the blockchain is a crucial tool for investigations and for deterring malicious actors. Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Vulnerabilities: While the funds originated from centralized exchanges, the attack targeted a DeFi platform, Hyperliquid. This highlights the interconnectedness of CeFi and DeFi and the potential for vulnerabilities in one area to impact the other. Crypto security needs to be robust across both centralized and decentralized platforms. Market Manipulation Concerns: The JELLY attack is a stark reminder of the risks of market manipulation in the cryptocurrency space, especially for newer and less liquid tokens. Understanding the source of funds helps in analyzing the motives and scale of such attacks. Binance and OKX Under Scrutiny: What Does This Mean for Exchange Reputation? While the report doesn‚Äôt directly implicate Binance or OKX in orchestrating the attack, the revelation that attacker funds were withdrawn from these platforms inevitably puts them under scrutiny. Does this tarnish their reputation? Not necessarily, but it does raise pertinent questions: Enhanced Monitoring: Will Binance and OKX enhance their transaction monitoring systems to detect and prevent suspicious withdrawal patterns that could precede market manipulation attempts? User Accountability: Should exchanges implement stricter measures to ensure user accountability and deter the use of their platforms for illicit activities, even if indirectly? Transparency and Cooperation: Will these exchanges cooperate with investigations into the Hyperliquid JELLY attack and share information to help identify the perpetrators? Transparency in such situations is crucial for maintaining user trust and demonstrating a commitment to crypto security . Fund Withdrawal and the Future of Crypto Investigations The fund withdrawal from OKX and Binance, as revealed by on-chain analysis, sets a precedent for future cryptocurrency investigations. It demonstrates the power of blockchain forensics in uncovering the origins of illicit funds and tracking their movement. This capability is increasingly vital as the crypto space matures and faces more sophisticated forms of attacks and financial crimes. Here are some potential implications for the future: Increased Reliance on On-Chain Analytics: Expect to see a greater reliance on on-chain analytics tools and firms like LookOnChain to investigate crypto-related incidents and provide crucial insights into fund flows. Collaboration Between Exchanges and Analytics Firms: Closer collaboration between cryptocurrency exchanges and blockchain analytics firms could become more common to proactively identify and mitigate risks related to money laundering and market manipulation. Regulatory Scrutiny: Incidents like the Hyperliquid JELLY attack, and the subsequent tracing of funds to major exchanges, might attract further regulatory scrutiny on exchanges and their security measures. Advancements in Crypto Security Technology: The need for more advanced crypto security technologies, both for exchanges and DeFi platforms, will become even more pressing to stay ahead of evolving attack vectors. Actionable Insights: What Can Crypto Users Learn? This incident offers valuable lessons for crypto users and the wider industry: Diversification of Exchange Usage: Consider diversifying your cryptocurrency holdings across multiple reputable exchanges to mitigate risks associated with any single platform. Stay Informed About Crypto Security Practices: Keep yourself updated on the latest crypto security best practices, including secure wallet management and being cautious of new and unaudited DeFi platforms. Support On-Chain Transparency: Advocate for greater transparency and on-chain data availability within the crypto ecosystem, as it is crucial for accountability and security. Exercise Caution with New Tokens: Be particularly cautious when trading newly launched or low-liquidity tokens, as they can be more susceptible to market manipulation. Conclusion: A Wake-Up Call for Crypto Security The revelation that funds used in the Hyperliquid JELLY attack were withdrawn from OKX and Binance serves as a potent reminder of the ongoing challenges in crypto security . While it doesn‚Äôt confirm any wrongdoing by these exchanges, it underscores the need for continuous vigilance, enhanced security protocols, and greater transparency across the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. The ability to trace funds is a powerful tool, but proactive measures and industry-wide collaboration are essential to prevent future incidents and foster a safer environment for all participants. To learn more about the latest crypto security trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto security best practices.

title: Resolution to kill IRS DeFi broker rule heads to Trump‚Äôs desk
body: The US Senate has passed a resolution to kill a Biden administration-era rule to require decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols to report to the Internal Revenue Service, which will now head to US President Donald Trump‚Äôs desk. On March 26, the Senate voted 70-28 to pass a motion repealing the so-called IRS DeFi broker rule that aimed to expand existing IRS reporting requirements to crypto. The Senate had voted to pass the resolution earlier in March, which also passed the House, but it was sent back to the Senate for a final vote before it could be sent to Trump. The White House‚Äôs AI and crypto czar, David Sacks, has said Trump supports killing the rule . This is a developing story, and further information will be added as it becomes available.

title: Revolutionizing Telegram: How TON Blockchain Unlocks a Thriving In-App Economy
body: Exciting news is buzzing in the crypto world! Pavel Durov, the visionary founder of Telegram, has officially declared The Open Network (TON) as the powerhouse behind Telegram‚Äôs rapidly expanding in-app economy. This bold move signals a significant leap for crypto adoption within mainstream social platforms, and it‚Äôs poised to reshape how users interact and transact within the Telegram ecosystem. Let‚Äôs dive deep into what this means for you and the future of Telegram. Unveiling the Powerhouse: Telegram In-App Economy Fueled by TON In a recent announcement on X, Pavel Durov highlighted the pivotal role of TON in Telegram‚Äôs burgeoning in-app ecosystem. But what exactly does this entail? Essentially, TON is no longer just a separate blockchain project; it‚Äôs becoming deeply intertwined with the very fabric of Telegram, powering crucial functionalities that directly impact users, creators, and developers. This integration isn‚Äôt just incremental; it‚Äôs fundamental. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of how TON is becoming central to the Telegram in-app economy : Payments for Telegram Ads: Forget traditional payment methods! In most countries, if you‚Äôre looking to promote your channel or bot with Telegram Ads , TON is now the go-to for payments. This streamlines the advertising process and potentially opens up new avenues for businesses and creators to reach their target audiences within Telegram. Exclusive Withdrawal Method for Creators and Developers: For those building bots, creating content, or developing within the Telegram ecosystem, TON serves as the primary method for withdrawing earnings. This is a game-changer, offering a potentially faster and more efficient way to access revenue compared to traditional banking systems, especially for a global user base. Trading Telegram Assets via TON-based NFTs: Ever wanted to own a unique Telegram username? Or perhaps send a digital gift that truly stands out? TON underpins the trading of Telegram assets like usernames and digital gifts through NFTs . This introduces a new layer of digital ownership and scarcity within Telegram, leveraging the booming NFT space. Backbone for Telegram Mini Apps: Those engaging and interactive Telegram Mini Apps , used by hundreds of millions, are built entirely on TON. This signifies a massive scale of operation and trust in TON‚Äôs infrastructure to support a significant portion of Telegram‚Äôs user activity. Decoding the Technology: Why TON Blockchain is Telegram‚Äôs Choice Durov didn‚Äôt just randomly pick a blockchain. He specifically emphasized TON‚Äôs scalability as a crucial factor. In a world where blockchain networks often struggle with transaction speeds and high fees, TON stands out. But what makes the TON blockchain so special, and why is it the ideal fit for Telegram‚Äôs ambitious plans? Sharding for Scalability: TON utilizes a technique called sharding. Imagine dividing a massive database into smaller, more manageable parts. Sharding does something similar for the blockchain, allowing it to process transactions in parallel across multiple shards (sub-blockchains). This dramatically increases throughput and allows TON to handle a significantly larger volume of transactions compared to blockchains without sharding. Designed for Billions of Transactions: Durov explicitly mentioned TON‚Äôs potential to support billions of transactions. This isn‚Äôt just marketing hype; it‚Äôs a testament to TON‚Äôs architecture, which is built from the ground up to handle massive scale, aligning perfectly with Telegram‚Äôs ever-growing user base and transaction demands. Real Fundamental Value: In a crypto landscape often filled with projects lacking tangible utility, Durov boldly stated that TON is ‚Äúone of the few blockchains with real fundamental value.‚Äù This endorsement from a tech leader like Durov carries significant weight and suggests that TON isn‚Äôt just about speculation; it‚Äôs about providing real-world utility and infrastructure. The choice of TON underscores Telegram‚Äôs commitment to building a robust and scalable in-app economy that can accommodate its massive global user base. It‚Äôs not just about adding crypto features; it‚Äôs about fundamentally rethinking how transactions and interactions happen within the platform. Pavel Durov‚Äôs Vision: A Decentralized Future for Telegram? Pavel Durov ‚Äòs endorsement of TON goes beyond just technological integration; it hints at a broader vision for Telegram‚Äôs future. By embracing blockchain technology and decentralization, Telegram could be positioning itself as a leader in the next evolution of social platforms. What could this vision entail? Empowering Creators and Users: By using TON for payments and withdrawals, Telegram potentially empowers creators and users with more control over their earnings and digital assets. Decentralized systems can often reduce reliance on intermediaries and potentially lower fees, benefiting both creators and users. Building a Web3 Ecosystem within Telegram: The integration of NFTs and Mini Apps on TON suggests Telegram is building a mini-Web3 ecosystem within its platform. This could attract developers and entrepreneurs looking to leverage Telegram‚Äôs massive user base to build decentralized applications and services. Future Decentralization of Telegram Infrastructure? While not explicitly stated, the deep integration with TON raises questions about the potential for further decentralization of Telegram‚Äôs infrastructure in the future. Could we see aspects of Telegram itself, beyond just the in-app economy, becoming more decentralized and community-driven? Durov‚Äôs statements suggest a long-term commitment to TON and a belief in the power of blockchain to enhance Telegram‚Äôs ecosystem. This could mark a turning point, not just for Telegram, but for how social platforms integrate with cryptocurrency technologies. Streamlining Transactions: Telegram Crypto Payments Powered by TON One of the most immediate and impactful applications of TON is in Telegram crypto payments . The shift to TON for Telegram Ads payments and creator withdrawals is more than just a technical upgrade; it represents a fundamental shift in how value is exchanged within the Telegram ecosystem. Let‚Äôs explore the benefits and implications: Feature Traditional Systems TON-Powered Telegram Payments Payment Method for Telegram Ads Credit Cards, Bank Transfers, etc. TON Withdrawal Method for Creators Bank Transfers, Payment Processors TON Transaction Speed Varies, can be slow Potentially Faster Transaction Fees Can be higher Potentially Lower Accessibility May have geographical limitations Potentially more globally accessible By embracing TON for crypto payments, Telegram is potentially offering a more efficient, cost-effective, and globally accessible payment infrastructure. This is particularly beneficial for creators and businesses operating in regions with limited access to traditional financial systems. Scaling for the Future: Can TON Scalability Handle Telegram‚Äôs Growth? The question on everyone‚Äôs mind is: Can TON scalability truly handle the demands of Telegram‚Äôs massive and ever-growing user base? Durov‚Äôs confidence is reassuring, but let‚Äôs delve deeper into the technical aspects of TON‚Äôs scalability and its potential limitations: Theoretical Limits of Sharding: While sharding significantly enhances scalability, it‚Äôs not a silver bullet. There are theoretical limits to how much a blockchain can scale, even with sharding. However, TON‚Äôs architecture is designed to push these limits further than many other blockchains. Real-World Performance Under Load: The true test of scalability is real-world performance under heavy load. As Telegram‚Äôs in-app economy grows and transaction volumes increase, TON‚Äôs network will be continuously tested. Ongoing monitoring and optimization will be crucial to ensure smooth performance. Future Upgrades and Developments: Blockchain technology is constantly evolving. TON, like other blockchains, will likely undergo continuous upgrades and improvements to further enhance its scalability and performance over time. Staying adaptable and innovative is key to maintaining long-term scalability. While challenges may arise, TON‚Äôs sharding architecture and focus on scalability position it well to handle Telegram‚Äôs future growth. The integration is a bold bet on the future of blockchain technology and its ability to support mainstream applications at scale. Conclusion: Telegram and TON ‚Äì A Powerful Partnership for the Future Pavel Durov‚Äôs announcement is a clear signal: TON is not just a side project; it‚Äôs the engine driving Telegram‚Äôs in-app economy and potentially shaping its future trajectory. From revolutionizing Telegram crypto payments to powering Telegram in-app economy , TON‚Äôs scalability and utility are being put to the test on a massive scale. Pavel Durov ‚Äòs vision of a decentralized and efficient platform is taking shape, leveraging the power of the TON blockchain . This partnership is one to watch closely, as it could set a new precedent for how social platforms integrate with cryptocurrency and blockchain technology, unlocking a world of possibilities for users, creators, and the entire crypto ecosystem. title: Canaan Advances North American Mining Strategy via New Agreements

title: Trump Endorses Senator Lummis for Bitcoin Advocacy, Aiming to Make U.S. the Crypto Capital of the World
body: President Donald Trump has endorsed Senator Cynthia Lummis for her advocacy in the cryptocurrency sector, specifically her efforts to position the United States as the 'Crypto Capital of the World.' Lummis, who serves as the Chair of the Senate Banking Subcommittee on Digital Assets, has been recognized for her commitment to advancing Bitcoin and digital assets. Trump praised her as an 'America First Warrior' and emphasized their collaboration in promoting a favorable environment for cryptocurrency in the U.S. He stated, 'We are working closely to make America the crypto capital of the world,' reflecting a concerted effort to enhance the nation's standing in the digital currency space.
